Welcome to the latest edition of the Haxe Roundup. Haxe is a high level, strictly typed programming language and cross-compiler.

Community Updates

News and Articles

  • Haxe Summit 2017 has been announced taking place in Amsterdam between September 13th and 16th at ‚Äúde Roos‚Äù. Only a few days left to get your early bird tickets!
  • The Haxe vscode extension recently has been updated, now with automatic tasks and an extension API.
  • The OpenFL team has released the Lime vscode extension which makes use of the new extension API.

Updates from the Haxe core

Current Proposals

  • Add Module-level functions & variables.
  • Add Function type syntax.
  • Add Type Matching.
  • Add Macro method forwarding.
  • Add Union Types.
  • Add the Spread operator.
  • Do you have an idea to improve Haxe? Consider creating a proposal.

Core Changes

60 commits have been made to Haxe compiler in the last week.

  • Typing order vs inline - issue.

You can get started using the latest features by downloading a nightly build of Haxe.

Take it easy everyone and have a good week!
